short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load and use the console away!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple tool to help out testing and checking out new ideas when you are offline.
It creates a new blank page in edit mode using: data:text/html, <html contenteditable>. And also links jQuery-1.11.1 packaged with the extension, making it a fully offline capable tool.
